metadata.name: The Ronin
metadata.description:
The Silent Ronin, as common folks call him.

He have been in many battles alongside his friend and Lord of Red Dragon Clan. 
After his death, the Samurai has abandoned the path of serving ( in his opinion that lord was the only person in this country worth serving ), and travels in land as a Ronin ( a Samurai without Lord ).

Offer His sword to help those in need, mostly farmers and common families, and they repay him with food and small tokens.
Being a farmer's son himself , he knows the suffering of those people and try all he can to protect them against Shogun dictatorship.


Character Illustration
From "Red Sun & Warriors" Series

2022 / 3900 Pixels / jpg
